The 6th International Workshop on
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics

[edit]

January 3 - 6, 1999
Ft. Lauderdale, FL, USA

The 6th International Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics (Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 1999) will be held in Ft. Lauderdale, FL, USA from Sunday, 3 January 1999 to Wednesday, 6 January 1999 at the Radisson Bahia Mar Beach Resort.

Since its inception in 1985, AISTATS has been an interdisciplinary gathering of researchers at the intersection of artificial intelligence, machine learning, statistics, and related areas.

The Proceedings of Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 1999 are now available.
